Package org.elasticsearch.xpack.ql.expression.function.scalar

Class ScalarFunction

java.lang.Object
org.elasticsearch.xpack.ql.tree.Node<Expression>
org.elasticsearch.xpack.ql.expression.Expression
org.elasticsearch.xpack.ql.expression.function.Function
org.elasticsearch.xpack.ql.expression.function.scalar.ScalarFunction
All Implemented Interfaces:
Resolvable
Direct Known Subclasses:
BaseSurrogateFunction, BinaryOptionalNumericFunction, BinaryScalarFunction, CaseInsensitiveScalarFunction, ConditionalFunction, ConfigurationFunction, In, Insert, Locate, Range, Replace, Substring, ThreeArgsDateTimeFunction, UnaryScalarFunction
public abstract class ScalarFunction extends Function
A ScalarFunction is a Function that takes values from some operation and converts each to another value. An example would be ABS(), which takes one value at a time, applies a function to the value (abs) and returns a new value.
